responsibilities: Design and build advanced data science and algorithm solutions to solve business problems such as fraud prevention, AML, user experience customization and optimization, and campaign management.
Understand the payment business and translate business problems into data science and algorithm solutions.
Apply cutting-edge machine learning technologies in various payment business use cases.
Own end-to-end model solution lifecycle and work with stakeholders to deliver business impact.
Improve modeling infrastructures, labels, features, and algorithms for robustness, automation, and generalization.
Enhance risk machine learning excellence in privacy/compliance, interoperability, risk perception, and analysis.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on designing and building data science and algorithm solutions for business problems, applying machine learning technologies, and improving modeling infrastructures. While these tasks involve advanced data science and machine learning, there is no specific mention of working with large language models (LLMs) or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with general machine learning applications rather than the specific task of fine-tuning LLMs.
